There is a statue depicting the new gods here...
Someone has written "False idols" here with blood.
There is a guest book one the table,
"This nightmare has taken it's toll on me. I am
devolving into a something far lesser than the man
"All the high morals and ethics have no value here.
The things I've done to survive..."
"There is no place for a little miscreant like me in
the warmth of the sun anymore. I am a part of these dungeons
"Part of this never-ending nightmare, just a one more
cog in this machine of fear and hunger..."
"In a way I find it comforting. I have a definite place
"But I am writing this here as a warning for anyone
who happens to step down to this darkness"
"Do leave if it is still possible."
You find a small booklet under the guest book,
you take the \c[2]Book of Fears\c[0] with you.

"On contrary to popular belief, I did not create these
"What you see is just me reflecting them."
"It'a an evil message but it has to be said."
"On the rainy day, I missed the funeral of my father."
"I just saw a glimpse of the coffin before it mechanized
and formed a mind of its own. Then it rolled away without
"Why did I miss the funeral? Because I was busy spraying gas
on the fish we caught just the other day."
"I had to say something to my father. He took his gas mask
off because he couldn't hear me."
"Only to be engulfed in the poisonous gasses."
"To my terror, the coffin rolled down the green hills to
greet me. To haunt me. The guilt was and is heavy to bear."
"It used to always be the same."
"We played football indoors with my best friend. We used
"The corridors, the living room and the staircase were left in
the shadows as the only light source was lighting the aisle
"Of course the ball had to roll under the staircase into the
"Slowly, scared stiff, I approached the darkness..."
"I knew it was going to happen, because I had seen the scene
so many times before, and once again the darkness approached
me with its eyes glowing and teeth grinning."
"You know the feeling when it's too heavy to run away. So
I gave in to the darkness. Time and time again."
"Only once the darkness catches you. It's not dark. You
see all the colours of the spectrum. Like a kaleidoscope."
"And the thing that terrifies me the most is the laughter and
the lips of a woman. The laughter that ends with the luring
"That is the real thing I fear."
"It'a an evil message but it has to be said."
Awful smell comes from all the rotten meat on
the table! Plates are covered with maggots.
It does make you wonder if someone actually eats this
stuff. After all, why have them here otherwise?
